name: DealVelocityDistributionChart
functionalRequirements:
## Distribution Chart Sub-component

### Purpose
Displays statistical distribution of deal velocities using box plots.

### Core Features
- Box plot visualization for each stage
- Shows quartiles, median, min/max values
- Interactive tooltips with statistics
- Clickable elements for drill-down
- Statistical calculations using simple-statistics
- Visual emphasis on hover

dataRequirements.description: Receives deal data and calculates distribution statistics

technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Chart Library
- Uses ECharts box plot series
- Calculates quartiles and outliers
- Manages chart lifecycle

### Statistical Processing
- Uses simple-statistics library
- Calculates min, Q1, median, Q3, max
- Handles edge cases with insufficient data
